isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - SEATS

svcsubproc.title: Install Passenger Air Bucket Seat on Daycab

important.para: It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 66
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place passenger side air bucket seat (Item 3) inside cab.

Position passenger side air bucket seat (Item 3) in place over seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) in cab floor and install four hex nuts and washers (Item 1). Tighten to 15 to 20 Lbf-ft (20.5 to 27 N•m). Connect air line (Item 3) to passenger air bucket seat at the quick disconnect connector (Item 4).

Position outboard tether belt (Item 8) and outer seat belt (Item 7) onto seat belt mounting bracket (Item 9) and install torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 6). Tighten to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 40.7 N•m).

Position inboard tether belt (Item 12) and inner seat belt buckle (Item 11) onto seat belt mounting bracket (Item 13) and install torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 10). Tighten to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 40.7 N•m).

svcsubproc.title: Install Fixed Passenger Seat on Daycab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 67
for Items in parentheses.

important.para: It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.

step1.para: Place fixed passenger seat (Item 3) inside cab.
Position fixed passenger seat (Item 3) in place over seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) in cab floor and install four hex nuts and washers (Item 1). Tighten to 15 to 20 Lbf-ft (20.5 to 27 N•m).

Position outboard tether belt (Item 8) and outer seat belt (Item 7) onto seat belt mounting bracket (Item 9) and install torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 6). Tighten to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 40.7 N•m).

Position inboard tether belt (Item 12) and inner seat belt buckle (Item 11) onto seat belt mounting bracket (Item 13) and install torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 10). Tighten to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 40.7 N•m).

Position outboard tether belt (Item 9) and outer seat belt (Item 8) onto seat belt mounting bracket (Item 10) and install torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 7). Tighten to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 40.7 N•m).

Position inboard tether belt (Item 13) and inner seat belt buckle (Item 12) onto seat belt mounting bracket (Item 14) and install torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 11). Tighten to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 40.7 N•m).
